name: careoptions-kids-dashboard
description: CareOptions for Kids - Revenue Cycle Management Dashboard v8.5 - Rebuilt on Hono + Cloudflare Pages

scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name careoptions-kids-dashboard
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit'

author: CareOptions for Kids
